preCopyScript.value:
@{concat('delete from ', pipeline().parameters.SinkSchema,'.',pipeline().parameters.SinkTable, ' where date = ''',
formatDateTime(addDays(addHours(utcNow(), 9),int(item().date)),'yyyyMMdd'),''' and projectid = ''',pipeline().parameters.Channel,''';')}

activities.name: API REQ INFO
activities.description: API 호출 정보를 가져오기 위해 설정 파일에서 Date 을 읽어옵니다.

query.value:
select a.gubun 
      ,a.keyword
      ,string_agg(a.inculde_keyword,',') as inculde_keyword
      ,a.inculde_keyword_and
      ,inculde_keyword_add||string_agg(a.inculde_keyword,'||')||inculde_keyword_add2  as api_inculde_keyword
      ,string_agg(a.db_inculde_keyword,',') as db_inculde_keyword
  from (
	    select gubun
	          ,keyword		        
	          ,inculde_keyword_and
	          ,inculde_keyword
	          ,case when length(inculde_keyword_and) !=0 then inculde_keyword_and||'&&(' else '' end  inculde_keyword_add
              ,case when length(inculde_keyword_and) !=0 then ')' else '' end inculde_keyword_add2
	          ,replace(inculde_keyword,'''','''''')  as db_inculde_keyword
	          ,row_number() over (partition by gubun, keyword, inculde_keyword_and)/20 as cnt 
	      from cd_portal.tb_kimchi_roh_news_keyword 
		) a 
 where a.gubun = '김치'
 group by a.gubun 
      ,a.keyword
      ,a.inculde_keyword_and
      ,a.inculde_keyword_add
      ,a.inculde_keyword_add2
 order by keyword

select a.gubun 
      ,a.keyword
      ,string_agg(a.inculde_keyword,',') as inculde_keyword
      ,a.inculde_keyword_and
      ,inculde_keyword_add||string_agg(a.inculde_keyword,'||')||inculde_keyword_add2  as api_inculde_keyword
      ,string_agg(a.db_inculde_keyword,',') as db_inculde_keyword
  from (
	    select gubun
	          ,keyword		        
	          ,inculde_keyword_and
	          ,inculde_keyword
	          ,case when length(inculde_keyword_and) !=0 then inculde_keyword_and||'&&(' else '' end  inculde_keyword_add
              ,case when length(inculde_keyword_and) !=0 then ')' else '' end inculde_keyword_add2
	          ,replace(inculde_keyword,'''','''''')  as db_inculde_keyword
	          ,row_number() over (partition by gubun, keyword, inculde_keyword_and)/20 as cnt 
	      from cd_portal.tb_kimchi_roh_news_keyword2 
		) a 
 where a.gubun = '김치'
 group by a.gubun 
      ,a.keyword
      ,a.inculde_keyword_and
      ,a.inculde_keyword_add
      ,a.inculde_keyword_add2
 order by keyword
